languages.text: "Прости, Абеляр. Я отказываю роду Версериан в своей защите".
"I'm sorry, Abelard. I refuse to offer House Werserian my protection."
languages.original_text: "Прости, Абеляр. Я отказываю роду Версериан в своей защите".

traits.locale_text: "I'm sorry, Abelard. I deny the Werserians my protection."
"I'm sorry, Abelard. I deny the Werserians my protection."
"I'm sorry, Abelard. I deny the Werserians my protection."
"I'm sorry, Abelard. I deny the Werserians my protection."
"I'm sorry, Abelard. I refuse to offer House Werserian my protection."
"I'm sorry, Abelard. I refuse to offer House Werserian my protection."

languages.text: “我很抱歉，阿贝拉德。我拒绝保护韦尔森家族。”
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, Abelard. I refuse to offer House Werserian my protection."

traits.locale_text: “我很抱歉，阿贝拉德。我拒绝保护韦尔森家族。”

languages.text: "Es tut mir leid, Abelard. Ich verweigere Haus Werserian meinen Schutz."
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, Abelard. I refuse to offer House Werserian my protection."

traits.locale_text: "Es tut mir leid, Abelard. Ich verweigere den Werserians meinen Schutz."

languages.text: «Lo siento, Abelard. Niego mi protección a los Werserian».
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, Abelard. I refuse to offer House Werserian my protection."

traits.locale_text: «Lo siento, Abelard. Niego mi protección a los Werserian».

languages.text: « {mf|Navré|Navrée}, Abélard, mais je refuse d'accorder ma protection à la maison Werserian. »
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, Abelard. I refuse to offer House Werserian my protection."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Navré|Navrée}, Abélard, mais je refuse d'accorder ma protection aux Werserian. »

languages.text: 「すまない、アベラルド。私はウェルザリアン家の保護を拒否する」
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, Abelard. I refuse to offer House Werserian my protection."

traits.locale_text: 「すまない、アベラルド。私はウェルザリアン家の保護を拒否する」

languages.text: "Üzgünüm Abelard. Werserian Hanesi'ne koruma sağlamayı reddediyorum."
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, Abelard. I refuse to offer House Werserian my protection."

traits.locale_text: "Üzgünüm Abelard. Werserian Hanesi'ne beni koruma şansını tanımayı reddediyorum."
